text: Osman Şahin (born 13 January 1998) is a Turkish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ofspor on loan from BB Erzurumspor. ==Professional career== Şahin made his professional debut with Erzurumspor in a 1-0 Süper Lig loss to İstanbul Başakşehir F.K. on 2 September 2018. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Arsin, Turkey Category:Turkish footballers Category:Erzurumspor footballers Category:24 Erzincanspor footballers Category:Süper Lig players Category:TFF Second League players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Osman Şahin
